data.title: 19 Celebrities That Live In Luxurious Privacy Away From LA And NYC
data.meta_description: It looks like Hollywood isn't everyone's dream!
data.text:
It looks like Hollywood isn't everyone's dream!

1. Drake's Toronto manor "house" isn't really a house — it's dubbed "The Embassy." The 50,000 square-foot embassy includes some mega amenities: an NBA full-size indoor basketball court, a 3,200 square-foot bedroom suite, a world-class recording studio, an awards room, the hall of sports jerseys museum, and an indoor swimming pool. The three-level home includes four bedrooms in addition to the master suite. The rapper purchased the land for $6.7 million in 2016 and has now grossed into a $100 million estate, talk about a steal!

2. Chris Hemsworth's mega-mansion in Byron Bay, Australia is worth $30 million with six bedrooms, a giant mural, personal gym, spa, media room, game room, infinity pool, and built-in fireplace. Talk about MARVEL-ous.

3. Pharrell Williams is known to represent a life of luxury. The recently named Louis Vuitton creative director lives in a $30 million waterfront mansion in Coral Gables, Florida. It features a 2,000-wine bottle cellar, a boathouse, calming koi pond, and an outdoor kitchen and pool.

4. Eminem resides in an 8,900-square-foot mansion in Clinton Township, Michigan. He purchased the home in 2000, which was worth $1.5 million at the time. It has grossed since then.

5. Nicole Kidman and Keith Urban spend the majority of their time at their $3.47 million mansion in Nashville, Tennessee, but their real estate portfolio doesn't end there. They also own properties in Sydney, Australia, and New York City. Their Nashville property is known as the Queen of Northumberland. The 10,925-square-foot mansion features seven bedrooms, a movie theatre, a hobby room, a large swimming pool, and tennis courts.

6. Serena Williams resides in a 14,500-square-foot Spanish Mediterranean-style home in Jupiter, Florida worth $5.7 million. The amenities include its own gym, sauna, wine cellar, infinity pool, karaoke room, and a 620-square-foot closet.

7. Blake Horstmann asked Love is Blind alum Giannina Gibelli to move into his Denver, Colorado home after the two were inseparable following their time on Paramount+'s, All-Star Shore.

8. Taylor Swift has an impressive $80 million real estate portfolio and besides being on tour, her Nashville home is where she spends most of her time. In addition to her Nashville penthouse, she has properties in Rhode Island, Los Angeles, and New York City. The $3 million Nashville property is a 2,973-square-foot space and fully renovated.

9. Sandra Bullock has several homes in "normal" locations. She has a house in Texas, a beach home in Georgia, and a Gothic mansion in New Orleans. She currently resides in New Orleans.

10. Justin Timberlake and Jessica Biel both prefer country life in Nashville and have been enjoying their home in private.

11. Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson has multiple residencies, but recently just bought a Powder Springs farmhouse in Georgia which costs $9.5 million with a wine cellar, a freeform pool, and a library. He purchased the home shortly after his Hawaiian wedding to long-time girlfriend, Lauren Hashian. The actor also has a $27.8 million mansion in Beverly Hills.

12. Mark Wahlberg purchased a $15.6 million mansion in Summerlin, Nevada. The two-story villa has four bedrooms, four full bathrooms, and two half baths. He wanted to move the family in order for his kids to have a "better life."

13. Celine Dion lives in a $1.2 million Las Vegas home with three bedrooms, a pool, and a semi-private golf course. She downsized homes following her diagnosis of stiff person syndrome (SPS).

14. Matthew McConaughey and his wife, Camila, call a 10,800 square-foot old-Spanish Mediterranean-style mansion his home. The Texas mansion holds eight bathrooms, seven bedrooms, a guest house, and seven boat slips near the lake.

15. Blake Shelton and Gwen Stefani escaped to their Oklahoma ranch during the pandemic and also wed there. While they share several properties in Los Angeles, Nashville, Lake Teoma, and the enormous Tishomingo residence — Ten Point Ranch. The Hawaiian-style home is surrounded by several barns, has a chapel, and is worth around $5 million.

16. Debby Ryan and Twenty One Pilot's drummer, Josh Dun, live in Columbus, Ohio. There's a psychedelic mural, boxing arena, recording studio and so much more.

17. Julia Roberts is in California, but not where most celebrities are. The actor resides in an $8.3 million Victorian-style mansion in San Francisco with five bedrooms, four bathrooms, and five floors.

18. George Clooney owns an 18th-century mansion in Lake Como that he bought in 2002 for $7 million and it features 25 bedrooms, a tennis court, an outdoor pool, a gym, a theatre, a huge garage for his vintage motorcycle collection, and a pizza room. The home is worth over $100 million now.

19. And finally, Floyd Mayweather has several million-dollar mansions. One in Beverly Hills, Las Vegas, and Miami. The $18 million waterfront mansion is in Palm Island. The three-story home expands into an 11,000-square-foot floor plan and a 5,000-square-foot rooftop deck with a patio pool. It also includes nine bedrooms, 10.5 bathrooms, a movie theater, a gym, and a game room with an owner's suite and a spa bathroom. Talk about luxe.
